title: Workshop on Developing ICT-Based Teaching Strategies for Higher Education Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Exploring efficient operational strategies for mobile device-based mathematics education for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more approaches for designing mathematics instruction utilizing diverse online resources
Learners can establish strategies to resolve copyright issues when developing assessment tools for digital environments
Learners can develop ICT-based strategies to provide flexible learning opportunities in large-scale learner environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
